mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.CmnsItemMapper.selectCmnsApcItem */ AIC.APC_CD AS APC_CD , AIC.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , AIC.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM , AIC.RAW_MTR_RDCD_RT AS RAW_MTR_RDCD_RT , AIC.SORT_RDCD_RT AS SORT_RDCD_RT , AIC.PCKG_RDCD_RT AS PCKG_RDCD_RT , AIC.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , AIC.NH_APC_CD AS NH_APC_CD , AIC.NH_ITEM_NM AS NH_ITEM_NM FROM TB_APC_ITEM_CRTR AIC WHERE AIC.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND AIC.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.CmnsItemMapper.selectCmnsItemList */ (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('CLS_CD', SUBSTR(IC.ITEM_CD, 0, 2)) FROM DUAL) AS CLS_NM , IC.ITEM_CD , IC.ITEM_NM , IC.DEL_YN FROM TB_ITEM_CRTR IC WHERE IC.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND IC.ITEM_CD LIKE #{itemCd} || '%'
AND IC.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{itemNm} || '%'
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_APC_ITEM_CRTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND X.ITEM_CD = IC.ITEM_CD )
ORDER BY IC.ITEM_CD

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.CmnsItemMapper.selectApcCmnsItemList */ AIC.APC_CD , AIC.ITEM_CD , AIC.ITEM_NM , AIC.DEL_YN , AIC.RAW_MTR_RDCD_RT , AIC.SORT_RDCD_RT , AIC.PCKG_RDCD_RT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APC_VRTY_CRTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = AIC.APC_CD AND X.ITEM_CD = AIC.ITEM_CD) AS VRTR_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APC_SPCFCT_CRTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = AIC.APC_CD AND X.ITEM_CD = AIC.ITEM_CD) AS SPCFCT_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APC_STD_GRD X WHERE APC_CD = AIC.APC_CD AND X.ITEM_CD = AIC.ITEM_CD) AS GRD_CNT FROM TB_APC_ITEM_CRTR AIC WHERE AIC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AIC.APC_CD = #{apcCd} ORDER BY AIC.ITEM_CD
